name: In SPACE no one can hear you CLICK
name_original: In SPACE no one can hear you CLICK
description:
Enter an experimental keyboard and run out of the space bar, testing the keys you find along the way.

This is a VR-only game. Don't have a headset? Watch a full playthrough here!

Controls:
Swing your arms and push off objects to move around (like in Gorilla Tag). Press the left Menu / B key to restart from the last checkpoint.

Made for the 2021 Epic MegaJam  with the "Running out of space" theme.

Supported platforms:
The game has been tested with HTC Vive Pro using SteamVR, Oculus Quest 2 - standalone and using Oculus Link. Should probably run with any SteamVR-compatible headset.

Join our Discord server to share your feedback, suggestions or chat about VR dev stuff! https://discord.gg/d7gqjtKQm4
